description:
Breakfast meeting:
What do you do when your business as usual is no longer a possibility?

How do you prioritise digital transformation when the revenue stream is strangled?

What is the result of acting with purpose when responding to market forces in a pandemic?

Stuart shares his thoughts and experiences as a digital leader in the retail domain over the last 24 months. Also how he started and sold a successful venture in this time and what he thinks the world will look like tomorrow based on the trends he can see today.

**
SPEAKER:
Stuart Freer, Chief Technology/Digital Officer for StrandBags, Australia and New Zealand's favourite place to buy the perfect bag.

Previously Stuart has been the Chief Digital and Data Officer at Mecca , Australia’s leading prestige beauty retailer, and the General Manager of Digital for Coles, leading technology teams for Coles online, enabling Coles online to grow by 50%.

**
This talk will be recorded and the link to the recording added to the Comments shortly after the event.
**
title: How to successfully respond to a pandemic in the world of retail
